item.description:
A highly rated NC-17 film.  Michael Fassbinder stars in a film that has gotten very strong reviews. Also the director Steve McQueen (Hunger) refused to edit the film to lower the rating to R,

Michael plays a 30-something tech worker whose compulsion is to seek out sexual pleasure wherever he can get it. When his troubled sister (Carey Mulligan) moves in with him, the compulsion veers out of control.
item.how_to_find_us: I volunteer there on Wednesdays, so I'll be collecting tickets.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Shame
